Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Provides for eligibility of certain participants in the New York City employees retirement system to opt into the twenty-five year retirement program for EMT members
Summary: Provides for eligibility of certain participants in the New York City employees retirement system to opt into the twenty-five year retirement program for EMT members.
LawCode: Amd ยง604-e, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to the eligibility of certain participants in the New York city employees' retirement system to opt into the twenty-five year retirement program for EMT members
